11511.content:
It was supposed to be a simple mission, get in, set the charges, get out. Robin groaned, as he tried to dodge agents from the Light. Batman had given him and Kid Flash a mission. According to some intel, the Light had set up a new outpost of Kobra-Venom, Kid Flash had gone to set up the charges, while Robin hacked into the system. Problem was it was a trap. Robin had just finished hacking through his holo-screen when the alarms went off, forcing him to head out.

He met up with Kid Flash in the chemical synthesis room, where the soldiers barged in and started blasting. "Man, I thought this would be easy!" Kid Flash said, zooming in and knocking out a guard whenever he could.

"Just hurry up and get out! I'll follow you!" Ordered Robin.

"Right!" Kid Flash said as he zoomed off.

Robin quickly jumped out of his hiding spot, throwing several exploding disks at the same time to distract them. He wasn't ready for a Bane to show up and throw him right through one of the vats of Kobra-Venom! He quickly crashed through, but not before he was absolutely soaked. He quickly took the advantage to get away, and just in time, as the bombs exploded!

He landed right beside Kid Flash, who took one look at him, and asked, "Dude, what the hell happened to you?"

"I'm fine... Let's just get home and analyze the data we took." Robin groaned. He was soaked down to the bone.

Later that night...

Robin groaned. He was definitely feeling sore all over now. He probably should've reported he was soaked in Kobra-Venom to Batman, but he decided against it. It was designed to be administrated via IV, so he probably was fine.

Problem was, Kobra-Venom could also be absorbed through the skin, with random effect, which was starting to manifest now, as Robin clutched himself in semi-erotic pain. Where was he clutching?

Brian wasn't after any old invention though. He was looking for the one device Stewie specifically told him not to touch, his new experimental Growth Ray. He probably could have deduced this was the secret prototype even if Stewie hadn't printed, in big block letters, GROWTH RAY 8 on the side.

"Eight?? I guess Stewie has already gone through a few of these..." Brian wondered to himself, a little bit nervous that something terrible might happen if the device didn't work right... but he was confident in Stewie's inventing abilities. The twink had already built a working Shrink Ray in the past (which Brian had broken years ago), not to mention, the boy built a freaking time machine. Odds were, if Stewie built it, it worked. Besides, Brian concluded, if he got cancer or something horrible the nanites in his bloodstream would heal him no problem.

info.brief_description: Men from various media get bigger
info.description:
In this interactive you're free to choose men from any cartoon, comic, video game or anime and make them get bigger, primarily in their bulge size or waistline.

A few simple rules
- All chapters must be of a reasonable length and decent spelling quality. (So basically no one line chapters 'kay)
- Don't suggest 500 different characters and never do anything with them or I'll cut that fluff
- Gay and Hetero are allowed, lewd stuff is fine
- Only males may gain, females can get chubby or become bimbos but nothing more than that
- Other types of expansion (i.e muscle, height, etc) are okay in moderation, but the focus of the story needs to be on endowment enlargement or weight gain
- No live action people, thankyou
